case.state: Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Good evening, Lucina. Serious as ever, I see.
As expected...
...Panty. Why am I unsurprised you're already uncivil about this?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
You lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I won't lose then!
Is that how it works? I didn't realize this was a high-stakes game, but let's roll with it.
Is that so? Interesting. Let's get on with it then.
So you lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I can't lose then!
Huh? You strip totally naked if you lose a hand? Did you really think that lie would work on me?
Dealer! Grant me ~cards~!
Maybe...no...oh! Got it! I'll take ~cards~.
Perhaps these next ~cards~ will be better.
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
There you are, Pit! Ah, but you didn't actually have to participate...Oh well, I'm sure a game against Cupid would be fine too.
Who can say?
Don't expect to beat me, Kurumu.
So who was it that invited Link's taunt to play?
Ooh, a tribute?
These are actually pretty good. Beginner's luck?
This oughta do it.
Excellent.
I swear I'm not cheating.
Well, it's only natural I get cards like these.
Perhaps this game isn't that bad.
I welcome this hand with open arms.
This oughta do it. With no time to spare!
Ooh, a tribute? I humbly accept.
Guess I really do have divine protection, don't I?
Truly a sight for sore eyes.
I think karma is finally settling in.
Things are finally going my way!
Feeling good about my chances here.
I'll take it!
That's what I like to see!
Pit! Glad you decided to join us after all.
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
Who can say?
Why am I not surprised I'd find you here, Douglas?
Are you ready for our rematch, Link? Say nothing if you are.
Oh, I remember you! You were an assist trophy, right?
Princess Peach? Never thought you to be that type of woman.
Hello, Rosalina. Good to see a fellow goddess.
It's been a while, Samus. Keeping busy?
Oh, hello, Wii Fit Trainer. Do you count poker as an exercise? Mental, maybe? Well, whatever.
Princess Zelda. A pleasure to see you again. May the best lady win!
I think I remember Corrin mentioning you once or twice, Rinkah. I hope you live up to their expectations.
Nothing special about these cards. Although I love the design!
Guess this can go either way.
Wait, is this--- never mind, it's just average.
I see, I see...
(I wonder who'd win in a fight: Magnus or Videl's father? World's strongest man versus the world champ...)
Nothing special about these cards. Although I love the design!
Guess this can go either way.
Wait, is this--- never mind, it's just average.
I see, I see...
(I wonder how Pearl would like Cragalanche. Maybe I can introduce him.)
Nothing special about these cards. I dig the decor though!
Guess this can go either way.
Just average?! I was hoping for better than average!
I see, I see...
So, you work with mechs, Sayla? Neat. (I wonder if they could beat the Great Sacred Treasure...)
Nothing special about these cards. I dig the decor though!
Guess this can go either way.
Just average?! I was hoping for better than average!
I see, I see...
I need this to come through... I'm so close...
Guess this can go either way.
I see, I see...
Nothing special about these cards. Although I love the design!
Wait, is this--- never mind, it's just average.
Nothing special about these cards. I dig the decor though!
Just average?! I was hoping for better than average!
Nothing special about these cards. Might need to clean them, though. Look a bit overused.
Hey, this isn't a great hand at all!
Nothing special about these cards. Pity.
Wow, I've never seen such an average hand before!
Nothing special about these cards, but I need special right now!
Guess this can go either way. Just gotta hope!
Average might not cut it, unfortunately.
I see... I don't like what I'm seeing.
This hand is really generic. And that worries me.
With my all-seeing eye, I see that this might go either way.
C'mon little guys, pull through for me!
The suspense is killing me!
Please don't disappoint me.
Now, how will this go...
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without showing a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
You know, Ladybug, I'm glad there are people like you to help the humans with their day-to-day conflicts. Certainly makes my job easier!
Your powers are quite unusual for a human, Wanda. Have you come into contact with gods before, by any chance?
Zizou, you're a goddess too? But you're so young...
Say Kim, I'm glad there are people like you to help the humans with their day-to-day conflicts. I can't handle all of it, you know, so thank you for doing what you do!
I'm... sure it'll be fine.
Great, I was hoping for the god of luck to take the day off.
So...anybody want to trade?
Am I really going to have to be the first to show off?
Great, I was hoping for the god of luck to take the day off.
So...anybody want to trade?
I'm... sure it'll be fine.

state.text: C'mon dealer, can't you cut your guardian a break?

case.state: Surely someone has something worse, right?
Wonderful. Just what I wanted to see.
So...anybody want to trade? I have hearts! You accept those, right?
Oh good, I was worried I would win this hand, Skyworld forbid.
This could be a problem.
You've gotta be kidding me.
So...how about these hands?
So...anybody want to trade? Actually, never mind. I've run out of trade ideas.
I am in no way fine right about now!
Annnnnnd there's the regret.
Gonna need some divine intervention here...
C'mon, I need to get through this...
Remind me, what was the forfeit exactly?
So as I was saying before, Rinkah, I have met Robin before. They have impressive magic. Oh, and I guess Chrom's okay too.
Rinkah's certainly been lucky. Let's try and bring her to the end, shall we?
Pit, I've seen you eying Rinkah from time to time. Too hot for ya?
Rinkah was a close ally of Corrin's, having been saved from execution early into their journey.
Rinkah here is an oni. Naturally, she specializes in clubs and axes in combat.
I'm more accustomed to granting guidance on violent endeavors. Okay, how about this... she seems to get mad easily. Try and bluff her into making a mistake.
How about this, Pit... warm her up with some light-hearted conversation.
Actually, I imagine out of many participants in this club, Rinkah would understand us better than most.
Corrin used to always give you trouble in Smash, yes? Rinkah could probably grant you some hot insider info for fighting them.
This game's going rather well, don't you agree?
So, now that we're more comfortable... Pit, what do you think of Rinkah?
You played Fates, right? So you should know who this is.
Oh, so that's the aura I was sensing. Just a zombie? Alright, let's continue.
Flowers from nowhere? Someone's been praying to Viridi, I see.
You know, Revy, you made one mistake: I'm not "God". I'm the Goddess of Light, and nothing more. I'm not omniscient; I can't save everyone, and for that, I'm sorry.
Oh? Either of these girls caught your eye, Pit?
Good to see you too, Corrin.
So a monster girl's playing with us, huh? Alright. I'll take the one-turn knockout.
There's hardly anything angel-like about you.
Anal, huh? I suppose if I find someone worthy enough, then yeah, I'd be into it. Maybe I'd even let them cum in there...
Ooh, I could use a drink! Any of your fancy bartender buddies know how to cook up a Drink of the Gods?
Oh, no. Whatever possibly gave you that impression?
Indeed I do...
I did! Twice now, in fact.
How bold of you! I don't grant a blessing to just anyone, you know. And what blessing could you possibly want, anyway?
What, this? I guess you could say it's like a crown.
With a name like that, I wouldn't expect otherwise.
What do you suppose they can do?
That's one way of looking at it. Many skilled warriors, representing their home universes... it really is like the Olympics. Except with only one event.
People aren't very religious these days, I'm afraid.
The worst? Probably the guilt that comes with the position. So many wrong decisions...
You'll get your chance another day, Amalia. I won't be here all the time.
Funny you say that...
Is that a threat? Cute.
Not just any goddess. I'm the Goddess of Light.
If you're going to ask if I can undo your loss, sorry. That's beyond my reach.
That's a good question... Launch, was it? But as a matter of fact, I am.
I know you just came back and all, but please try and pay attention.
That's not surprising. Most gods are jerks.
What kind of goddesses do you even have, Launch?
Says the girl who's already completed her forfeit.
Well, I don't need your approval. Especially considering you have such a... polarizing personality.
I'm not sure if you mean that in a good or bad way, and frankly, I don't care.
I suppose I don't mind...but please don't call me archaic. I'm not that old.
You'd be surprised how many deities there are. In fact, I know a certain Goddess of Nature you'd probably love!
Of course, Canary. I'm as subject to the rules of the game as you.
Obviously. Why'd I be here if I wasn't?
Well, if I was using all my power, this game would be over instantly. But I want a fair fight.
Why a street fighting cop would play strip poker is beyond me too, but you don't see me complaining.
That's what you think. This isn't even my final form!
I'm... sorry to hear that. I assure you, I don't approve of... questionable things done in my name.
I won't deny that! But I'm curious: what sort of dominion do you have?
Are you implying you think you'll beat me? Then let's go!
What, don't believe I'm that powerful? Stick around after the game. I'll show you it's not just a title.
You mean that deer thing that comes out of the occasional Master Ball? Yeah, I think I've got a good edge on it.
I wasn't born lucky, Pit. Even I lose sometimes.
That I am, Saki. The goddess of light.
No need to bow. Just give me a good game, Tracer. That's all I ask.
I have no idea what you mean, Canary.
Is that so? I'd love to meet your girlfriend, Jura.
Good suggestion, Marinette. I've been looking for new ways to mess with Pit.
I'll leave that up to your imagination.
I'm just a normal player tonight. Don't worry about me.
You better believe it, Canary.
Incredible, isn't it? But I think you'll like how this ends.
Well, I do, but they don't undress me. I might let Pit start doing that once he's more used to being around naked women, though.
Good. Don't go easy on me! That goes for all of you!
You're right, but just call me Palutena.
Is that such a big deal? You have recreations of the gods naked all over.
I suppose you can have at least one win on me.
I mean, I'm still winning. What's one more for the pile?
And I was doing pretty good too...
With how you all are? Sure, I'll take it.
I can do this all day! ...At least I could've, before I ran out of buffer items.
I was hardly the first, but I guess all eyes on me now!
That hurts, but at least it won't be a one-goddess act.
You'll get your chance another day, Amalia. I won't be here all the time.
Funny you say that...

Seems I lost. Perverse as they are, I'll respect the rules.
Oh no, not one of my many adornments! Anything but that!
As they say, third time's the charm. Now let's not beat me again, okay?
I'm losing quite a bit here. Might need to step it up.
Wait, how did this happen? This is all going so quickly...
Well, I refuse to remove my crown...but that leaves...
Hoo boy. Transparency sounds good right about now...
You'll get your chance another day, Amalia. I won't be here all the time.
Funny you say that...

Is that such a big deal? You have recreations of the gods naked all over.
Three in a row? Seriously?
...I see all of you bundled up. That's fine. I like a challenge!
Okay, bad start. But I'll still come out on top.
This is going a lot worse than I thought...
Have none of you heard of balance? Look it up!
The payoff better be worth it...
I didn't sign up for this!
I smell a conspiracy! Maybe Pit was right after all...
Don't you have lovers you'd rather see strip?
It'll be nice to get these off. Mind if I take a seat?
It'll be nice to get these off. Here, I can even stand while doing so.
A picture sounds like fun. Let's do it, Pit!
That's right. Unbelievable, maybe but I am a goddess.
Thank you, Ruby. I'm glad someone here knows fashion when she sees it.
A picture? I guess one wouldn't hurt. But I'd appreciate it if you kept it above the shoulders.
Less than I'd like, my friend...
Objectively speaking, Bayonetta in her prime was the worst I ever had to deal with.
You don't need a blessing for that. If you wish, I could share some tips on being more charismatic.
It's... really nothing special. Just gold.
I would, but the site I used to host my old videos on went down years ago.
They've been spoiled by their pornography, it seems.
It was a brilliant opportunity, and I'm pleased I was able to join the battle.
That would probably the three years when I was controlled by a parasite... I waged war against the humans I swore to protect...
Does your chat have a fetish for suffering? I suppose that explains a lot...
Gods and goddesses aren't just some pantheon of end-all divine rulers. Well, we are, but we have emotions, just like humans.
You worry too much, Pit. I have plenty of protection here. Like you.
Uh, no. You're very, very alive, Saki.
Of course, Zizou. They cover the least skin.
They are a bit cliche, aren't they?
Really? Pit's always telling me something like that too. But it got tiring after a while, so I learned to tune him out.
Yep, sandals are next. Don't get too excited.
I appreciate it, Chiaki. I try my best to be kind to all my humans.
And here goes my brooch, amongst other neckwear.
Rude. And here I thought this would be a pleasant game.
Yes, although it's... just a brooch, Zizou.
You don't actually feel bad, Pit. You would've stayed my plus one, in that case.
More than you know.
Why yes, I do count my legwear. Speaking of, you should look into some sometime.
Fashion doesn't need a reason, Elizabeth.
Er, thank you, Marinette. I have a bad history of falling under mind control, so that's reassuring.
You know as well as I do why I wear the one.
Bit too aggressive. It's only a single stocking, you know.
No. I lost, so this is my burden to bare.
I'm afraid I'm not omnipotent, Sonya. I can't protect a realm outside my jurisdiction.
Uh, there's no holes in this dress, Zizou.
What a mess I'm in...
...Palupanties? That's not even very clever.
Let's see... my armwear seems like a worthy choice, even though my aegis is back in Skyworld.
Hmm... well, my armbands are probably the most expendable things I have. Other than my centurions, of course.
Good thing I'm pretty well-adorned! First up, the armbands.
Here's a sandal. In fact, have both sandals.
Here, take the sandals. I still have plenty of accessories, this is nothing!
What to choose... know what? Sandals next.
Well, I guess my brooch can get heavy at times. The choker will stay, though.
Are you looking forward to me removing my neckwear?
Guess the neckwear's next. Exciting stuff.
The belts! I knew having you around was a good idea.
Ooookay, belts it is. They're mostly useless anyway.
Perhaps the belts? They are rather decorative, after all.
I just wore the one stocking today. Don't let me catch you smelling it or anything like that!
Just one stocking. Is that really all I had left?
Way to ruin the height of asymmetrical fashion, everyone.
No turning back now. Get ready-
I knew this was coming, but I hoped it wouldn't reach this point...
Unfortunate, but I'm not one to dishonor my bets. Prepare yourselves!
A goddess dropping the last of her clothes for mortals... how degrading!
Here we go... my last bit of protection...
Well this is a terrible situation...
Oh, silly me. You wouldn't be here if you did.
Sure, but we also wear shirts...
It sure would've been. But there's no one like that in the room, right?
She's just a wannabe. Ignore her.
While I appreciate the concern, be professional and suck it up, Pit!
That's a little weird. I don't have dominion over Remnant...
Those weren't the bad type, were they? The not-safe-for-work variety?
Of course. Now, I expect you to have the same amount of tact.
They'll have to do much better if any of them want a chance with me.
To all five of you who didn't know, you're welcome.
My presence is a blessing enough, is it not?
I won't humiliate myself that far.
I prefer to earn my followers through my deeds as Goddess of Light, but thank you for the suggestion.
I'll consider. But you have to prove yourself worthy.
O-Oh! No, Smash isn't sexual by nature... although I know a few fighters who did get frisky with each other...
It's important your audience learns their history, so I don't mind talking about it.
Contrary to popular belief, the gods are people, too.
Hey, I'm keeping a close eye on her, Marinette. But as long as they're on their best behavior, it can wait.
(I should keep an eye on Kira. There's no mistaking that look of lust on his face...)
See? Life moves on.
Really? That sounds like all the commanders of the Underworld combined!
Right. Well, now that we've established that, let's move on.
I'd like to see you do better, Ms. Goddess of Magic.
Come to think of it, I still need to get you a new pair, huh? We'll deal with that later.
Just a boutique in Skyworld. Nothing grandiose about it.
Aww, afraid the other players will get to see my collarbone? Seriously, it's no big deal, Pit.
It brings back a lot of good memories. And style, of course.
...Twilight, how do I put this... those weren't necklaces.
That suits me just fine. One less layer I need to knock you down a peg.
Come now Corrin, you're a tactician.You use the most efficient option available, right?
How does the plainer appearance look? Does it suit me?
Guess so, Zizou. Just a plain old dress should be enough.
I'll just pretend I didn't hear that, Aimee.
Have more faith in me. I can still pull it off!
You may have destroyed it now, but it'll be back. It always comes back, Zizou.
Glad to have not disappointed for once.
You're not making this any easier, Marinette.
Sometimes a good laugh is just what the soul needs.
Did she really say that about me?
That's fine. No one would want to look at such a bitter woman anyway.
Hypocrite. We're the same type of goddess.
And you just had to remind me of "her" too...
Can't tell you, Juri. No one's... tasted it before.
That's a secret, Marinette.
You're stuttering. Am I that beautiful?
If you say "I told you so", I'll shave your wings in your sleep.
Well? Has the beauty of a real goddess taken your breath away, Zizou?
And that's that.
This is acceptable, right?
While I'm sure you'd love to keep staring at my forearms, I'd like to keep playing.
So I'm matching your expectations, right?
It feels better this way anyway.
Considering what type of place this is, maybe I should have worn another stocking.
Congrats, you managed to see a goddess's collarbone. You must be very proud of yourselves.
That's genuine gold there. I can give you all a closer look after the game, if you want.
Did you know that that brooch is magic? It saves people turned to stone. Not that it helps here.
It's like a flowing white gown. What do you think?
Plain things can be beautiful, too.
What? Did you expect me to remove even more? No such thing as a free lunch, kids.
Okay, you got me down to my essentials. Now I'll have to get serious!
My generosity seems to have backfired... well, no more of that.
Perhaps I should've been more conservative. All I can do now is my best to stave off another loss.
There. Hey, d-don't look at me like that!
This was my fault, so I'll handle the consequences.
Perhaps I should've worn modesty shorts today. Although I suppose it's better than going without...
I don't know the last time I felt this vulnerable...
I know I have a nice body, but please refrain from staring.
Hey now, it's not polite to stare.
I feel like this was a good trade.
Well well! It seems like ~name~ is going to do something!
~name~? What a treat!
I saw this coming from a mile away. Doesn't make it any less sweet.
And here. We. Go!
Yes, please, lose some more. You won't see me complaining.
Good ol' ~name~, taking the bullet for the rest of us.
I feel like my straps made for a good trade.
Hopefully this will be a good trade.
I'm still in this!
Why couldn't you have lost this much when I was still in?
Good ol' ~name~. What's it gonna be?
Yes, please, lose some more. You won't see me complaining...
~name~, you have no idea how much I want this right now.
Well well... It seems like ~name~ is going to do something...
~name~? What a treat...
I saw this coming from a mile away. Doesn't make it any less sweet...
Ah... here we. go...
Hopefully this will be good...
Good ol' ~name~...
Could this not have come sooner?!
What a cute little robot.
This guy has, like, two frames of animation. Am I the only one who noticed?
How about you go for broke? Take off something big.
First time in years I'm getting to see Pit naked. Let's see how much you've grown.
Bad luck, Spikey. What's it gonna be?
Oh, well if it's ~name~ this time I'm not complaining.
My advice, ~name~? I personally recommend going for a big play this round.
Personally, I love this part.
If it makes you feel better, this is what I've been waiting for.
Oh! Let me see if I can predict what you'll take off.
Well, you shouldn't stop. Strip for me!
Cutting it real close, but I can't stop now! Strip for me!
Your turn, ~name~... hey, worry about yourself, not me!
Go for a big play this round!
Personally, I love this part. This'll be good...
If it makes you feel better, I've been waiting for this for a while...
Well, guess this isn't all bad.
Yes...give me more!
Well, guess this isn't all bad...
Where were you a few minutes ago?!
That's another one down!
~name~ was the loser this time! Let's see you!

state.text: Oh hey, it's... ~name~... you could at least acknowledge us, you know.

case.state: Oh, good. I was worried you didn't lose for a second.
Oh, I didn't realize it was ~name~'s time to strip.
Any round you lose is one that I don't. So by all means, keep losing.
Not gonna lie, I was hoping it was you this time.
Come onnnn ~name~!
Go on, no need to be shy in front of your goddess!
That's a relief!
It's not over yet! Take it off!
I'm curious what you'll pick!
I appreciate this...
Come now, ~name~, take it off!
~name~ was the loser this time... looking forward to seeing you!
Oh, good. ~name~ losing makes for quite the treat!
